TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定可以使用枚举进一步检测成员。

span.span: Specifies that the member can be further detected by using an enumeration.

related.span: 如何：指定 XML 流的替代元素名称

span.span: How to: Specify an Alternate Element Name for an XML Stream

related.span: 使用属性控制 XML 序列化

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Choices`，其中包含两个字段`MyChoice`和`ManyChoices`。The following example serializes a class named `Choices` that includes two fields, `MyChoice` and `ManyChoices`. 应用于指定的每个字段 (通过属性) 来获取或设置一个枚举，检测到的成员值的另一个类成员。The is applied to each field that specifies (through the property) another class member that gets or sets an enumeration that detects the member value. `MyChoice`字段可以在中找到相应的枚举成员设置为单个值，`EnumType`字段。The `MyChoice` field can be set to a single value, with a corresponding enumeration member found in the `EnumType` field. `ManyChoices`字段会返回一个对象数组。The `ManyChoices` field returns an array of objects. `ChoiceArray`字段会返回一个枚举值数组。The `ChoiceArray` field returns an array of enumeration values. 每个数组成员`ManyChoices`字段中，返回的数组中找到相应成员`ChoiceArray`字段。For each array member in the `ManyChoices` field, a corresponding member is found in the array returned by the `ChoiceArray` field. [!code-cpp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CPP/choice.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CS/choice.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/VB/choice.vb#1)]

param.name: name
param.span: 返回用于检测选项的枚举的成员名称。

span.span: The member name that returns the enumeration used to detect a choice.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MemberName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MemberName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置字段的名称，该字段返回在检测类型时使用的枚举。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field that returns the enumeration to use when detecting types.

value.span: 返回枚举的字段的名称。

span.span: The name of a field that returns an enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 至少一个成员必须存在于名为中的字段所返回的枚举值。At least one member must be present in the enumeration returned by the field named in the value. 默认情况下，该枚举的名称采用的字段名称的应用于。By default, that enumeration name takes the name of the field that the is applied to. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Choices`，其中包含两个字段`MyChoice`和`ManyChoices`。The following example serializes a class named `Choices` that includes two fields, `MyChoice` and `ManyChoices`. 应用于指定的每个字段 (通过属性) 来获取或设置一个枚举，检测到的成员值的另一个类成员。The is applied to each field that specifies (through the property) another class member that gets or sets an enumeration that detects the member value. `MyChoice`字段可以在中找到相应的枚举成员设置为单个值，`EnumType`字段。The `MyChoice` field can be set to a single value, with a corresponding enumeration member found in the `EnumType` field. `ManyChoices`字段会返回一个对象数组。The `ManyChoices` field returns an array of objects. `ChoiceArray`字段会返回一个枚举值数组。The `ChoiceArray` field returns an array of enumeration values. 每个数组成员`ManyChoices`字段中，返回的数组中找到相应成员`ChoiceArray`字段。For each array member in the `ManyChoices` field, a corresponding member is found in the array returned by the `ChoiceArray` field. [!code-cpp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CPP/choice.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CS/choice.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/VB/choice.vb#1)]
